00041 #include "selftest.h"

00043 static int brw_srv_workitems = SFW_TEST_WI_MAX;
00044 module_param(brw_srv_workitems, int, 0644);
00045 MODULE_PARM_DESC(brw_srv_workitems, "# BRW server workitems");
00046 
00047 static int brw_inject_errors;
00048 module_param(brw_inject_errors, int, 0644);
00049 MODULE_PARM_DESC(brw_inject_errors, "# data errors to inject randomly, zero by default");
00050 
00051 static void
00052 brw_client_fini (sfw_test_instance_t *tsi)
00053 {
00054         srpc_bulk_t     *bulk;
00055         sfw_test_unit_t *tsu;
00056 
00057         LASSERT(tsi->tsi_is_client);
00058 
00059         list_for_each_entry(tsu, &tsi->tsi_units, tsu_list) {
00060                 bulk = tsu->tsu_private;
00061                 if (bulk == NULL)
00062                         continue;
00063 
00064                 srpc_free_bulk(bulk);
00065                 tsu->tsu_private = NULL;
00066         }
00067 }
00068 
00069 static int
00070 brw_client_init (sfw_test_instance_t *tsi)
00071 {
00072         sfw_session_t    *sn = tsi->tsi_batch->bat_session;
00073         int               flags;
00074         int               npg;
00075         int               len;
00076         int               opc;
00077         srpc_bulk_t      *bulk;
00078         sfw_test_unit_t  *tsu;
00079 
00080         LASSERT(sn != NULL);
00081         LASSERT(tsi->tsi_is_client);
00082 
00083         if ((sn->sn_features & LST_FEAT_BULK_LEN) == 0) {
00084                 test_bulk_req_t  *breq = &tsi->tsi_u.bulk_v0;
00085 
00086                 opc   = breq->blk_opc;
00087                 flags = breq->blk_flags;
00088                 npg   = breq->blk_npg;
00089                 /* NB: this is not going to work for variable page size,
00090                  * but we have to keep it for compatibility */
00091                 len   = npg * PAGE_CACHE_SIZE;
00092 
00093         } else {
00094                 test_bulk_req_v1_t  *breq = &tsi->tsi_u.bulk_v1;
00095 
00096                 /* I should never get this step if it's unknown feature
00097                  * because make_session will reject unknown feature */
00098                 LASSERT((sn->sn_features & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) == 0);
00099 
00100                 opc   = breq->blk_opc;
00101                 flags = breq->blk_flags;
00102                 len   = breq->blk_len;
00103                 npg   = (len + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) >> PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00104         }
00105 
00106         if (npg > LNET_MAX_IOV || npg <= 0)
00107                 return -EINVAL;
00108 
00109         if (opc != LST_BRW_READ && opc != LST_BRW_WRITE)
00110                 return -EINVAL;
00111 
00112         if (flags != LST_BRW_CHECK_NONE &&
00113             flags != LST_BRW_CHECK_FULL && flags != LST_BRW_CHECK_SIMPLE)
00114                 return -EINVAL;
00115 
00116         list_for_each_entry(tsu, &tsi->tsi_units, tsu_list) {
00117                 bulk = srpc_alloc_bulk(lnet_cpt_of_nid(tsu->tsu_dest.nid),
00118                                        npg, len, opc == LST_BRW_READ);
00119                 if (bulk == NULL) {
00120                         brw_client_fini(tsi);
00121                         return -ENOMEM;
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 tsu->tsu_private = bulk;
00125         }
00126 
00127         return 0;
00128 }
00129 
00130 #define BRW_POISON      0xbeefbeefbeefbeefULL
00131 #define BRW_MAGIC       0xeeb0eeb1eeb2eeb3ULL
00132 #define BRW_MSIZE       sizeof(__u64)
00133 
00134 static int brw_inject_one_error(void)
00135 {
00136         struct timeval tv;
00137 
00138         if (brw_inject_errors <= 0) return 0;
00139 
00140         do_gettimeofday(&tv);
00141 
00142         if ((tv.tv_usec & 1) == 0) return 0;
00143 
00144         return brw_inject_errors--;
00145 }
00146 
00147 static void
00148 brw_fill_page(struct page *pg, int pattern, __u64 magic)
00149 {
00150         char *addr = page_address(pg);
00151         int   i;
00152 
00153         LASSERT (addr != NULL);
00154 
00155         if (pattern == LST_BRW_CHECK_NONE) return;
00156 
00157         if (magic == BRW_MAGIC)
00158                 magic += brw_inject_one_error();
00159 
00160         if (pattern == LST_BRW_CHECK_SIMPLE) {
00161                 memcpy(addr, &magic, BRW_MSIZE);
00162                 addr += PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - BRW_MSIZE;
00163                 memcpy(addr, &magic, BRW_MSIZE);
00164                 return;
00165         }
00166 
00167         if (pattern == LST_BRW_CHECK_FULL) {
00168                 for (i = 0; i < PAGE_CACHE_SIZE / BRW_MSIZE; i++)
00169                         memcpy(addr + i * BRW_MSIZE, &magic, BRW_MSIZE);
00170                 return;
00171         }
00172 
00173         LBUG ();
00174         return;
00175 }
00176 
00177 static int
00178 brw_check_page(struct page *pg, int pattern, __u64 magic)
00179 {
00180         char  *addr = page_address(pg);
00181         __u64  data = 0; /* make compiler happy */
00182         int    i;
00183 
00184         LASSERT (addr != NULL);
00185 
00186         if (pattern == LST_BRW_CHECK_NONE)
00187                 return 0;
00188 
00189         if (pattern == LST_BRW_CHECK_SIMPLE) {
00190                 data = *((__u64 *) addr);
00191                 if (data != magic) goto bad_data;
00192 
00193                 addr += PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - BRW_MSIZE;
00194                 data = *((__u64 *) addr);
00195                 if (data != magic) goto bad_data;
00196 
00197                 return 0;
00198         }
00199 
00200         if (pattern == LST_BRW_CHECK_FULL) {
00201                 for (i = 0; i < PAGE_CACHE_SIZE / BRW_MSIZE; i++) {
00202                         data = *(((__u64 *) addr) + i);
00203                         if (data != magic) goto bad_data;
00204                 }
00205 
00206                 return 0;
00207         }
00208 
00209         LBUG ();
00210 
00211 bad_data:
00212         CERROR ("Bad data in page %p: "LPX64", "LPX64" expected\n",
00213                 pg, data, magic);
00214         return 1;
00215 }
00216 
00217 static void
00218 brw_fill_bulk(srpc_bulk_t *bk, int pattern, __u64 magic)
00219 {
00220         int         i;
00221         struct page *pg;
00222 
00223         for (i = 0; i < bk->bk_niov; i++) {
00224                 pg = bk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_page;
00225                 brw_fill_page(pg, pattern, magic);
00226         }
00227 }
00228 
00229 static int
00230 brw_check_bulk(srpc_bulk_t *bk, int pattern, __u64 magic)
00231 {
00232         int         i;
00233         struct page *pg;
00234 
00235         for (i = 0; i < bk->bk_niov; i++) {
00236                 pg = bk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_page;
00237                 if (brw_check_page(pg, pattern, magic) != 0) {
00238                         CERROR ("Bulk page %p (%d/%d) is corrupted!\n",
00239                                 pg, i, bk->bk_niov);
00240                         return 1;
00241                 }
00242         }
00243 
00244         return 0;
00245 }
00246 
00247 static int
00248 brw_client_prep_rpc (sfw_test_unit_t *tsu,
00249                      lnet_process_id_t dest, srpc_client_rpc_t **rpcpp)
00250 {
00251         srpc_bulk_t         *bulk = tsu->tsu_private;
00252         sfw_test_instance_t *tsi = tsu->tsu_instance;
00253         sfw_session_t       *sn = tsi->tsi_batch->bat_session;
00254         srpc_client_rpc_t   *rpc;
00255         srpc_brw_reqst_t    *req;
00256         int                  flags;
00257         int                  npg;
00258         int                  len;
00259         int                  opc;
00260         int                  rc;
00261 
00262         LASSERT(sn != NULL);
00263         LASSERT(bulk != NULL);
00264 
00265         if ((sn->sn_features & LST_FEAT_BULK_LEN) == 0) {
00266                 test_bulk_req_t *breq = &tsi->tsi_u.bulk_v0;
00267 
00268                 opc   = breq->blk_opc;
00269                 flags = breq->blk_flags;
00270                 npg   = breq->blk_npg;
00271                 len   = npg * PAGE_CACHE_SIZE;
00272 
00273         } else {
00274                 test_bulk_req_v1_t  *breq = &tsi->tsi_u.bulk_v1;
00275 
00276                 /* I should never get this step if it's unknown feature
00277                  * because make_session will reject unknown feature */
00278                 LASSERT((sn->sn_features & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) == 0);
00279 
00280                 opc   = breq->blk_opc;
00281                 flags = breq->blk_flags;
00282                 len   = breq->blk_len;
00283                 npg   = (len + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) >> PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00284         }
00285 
00286         rc = sfw_create_test_rpc(tsu, dest, sn->sn_features, npg, len, &rpc);
00287         if (rc != 0)
00288                 return rc;
00289 
00290         memcpy(&rpc->crpc_bulk, bulk, offsetof(srpc_bulk_t, bk_iovs[npg]));
00291         if (opc == LST_BRW_WRITE)
00292                 brw_fill_bulk(&rpc->crpc_bulk, flags, BRW_MAGIC);
00293         else
00294                 brw_fill_bulk(&rpc->crpc_bulk, flags, BRW_POISON);
00295 
00296         req = &rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.brw_reqst;
00297         req->brw_flags = flags;
00298         req->brw_rw    = opc;
00299         req->brw_len   = len;
00300 
00301         *rpcpp = rpc;
00302         return 0;
00303 }
00304 
00305 static void
00306 brw_client_done_rpc(sfw_test_unit_t *tsu, srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
00307 {
00308         __u64                magic = BRW_MAGIC;
00309         sfw_test_instance_t *tsi = tsu->tsu_instance;
00310         sfw_session_t       *sn = tsi->tsi_batch->bat_session;
00311         srpc_msg_t          *msg = &rpc->crpc_replymsg;
00312         srpc_brw_reply_t    *reply = &msg->msg_body.brw_reply;
00313         srpc_brw_reqst_t    *reqst = &rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.brw_reqst;
00314 
00315         LASSERT(sn != NULL);
00316 
00317         if (rpc->crpc_status != 0) {
00318                 CERROR("BRW RPC to %s failed with %d\n",
00319                        libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest), rpc->crpc_status);
00320                 if (!tsi->tsi_stopping) /* rpc could have been aborted */
00321                         atomic_inc(&sn->sn_brw_errors);
00322                 return;
00323         }
00324 
00325         if (msg->msg_magic != SRPC_MSG_MAGIC) {
00326                 __swab64s(&magic);
00327                 __swab32s(&reply->brw_status);
00328         }
00329 
00330         CDEBUG(reply->brw_status ? D_WARNING : D_NET,
00331                "BRW RPC to %s finished with brw_status: %d\n",
00332                libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest), reply->brw_status);
00333 
00334         if (reply->brw_status != 0) {
00335                 atomic_inc(&sn->sn_brw_errors);
00336                 rpc->crpc_status = -(int)reply->brw_status;
00337                 return;
00338         }
00339 
00340         if (reqst->brw_rw == LST_BRW_WRITE)
00341                 return;
00342 
00343         if (brw_check_bulk(&rpc->crpc_bulk, reqst->brw_flags, magic) != 0) {
00344                 CERROR("Bulk data from %s is corrupted!\n",
00345                        libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest));
00346                 atomic_inc(&sn->sn_brw_errors);
00347                 rpc->crpc_status = -EBADMSG;
00348         }
00349 
00350         return;
00351 }
00352 
00353 static void
00354 brw_server_rpc_done(srpc_server_rpc_t *rpc)
00355 {
00356         srpc_bulk_t *blk = rpc->srpc_bulk;
00357 
00358         if (blk == NULL)
00359                 return;
00360 
00361         if (rpc->srpc_status != 0)
00362                 CERROR("Bulk transfer %s %s has failed: %d\n",
00363                        blk->bk_sink ? "from" : "to",
00364                        libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer), rpc->srpc_status);
00365         else
00366                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Transferred %d pages bulk data %s %s\n",
00367                        blk->bk_niov, blk->bk_sink ? "from" : "to",
00368                        libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer));
00369 
00370         sfw_free_pages(rpc);
00371 }
00372 
00373 static int
00374 brw_bulk_ready(srpc_server_rpc_t *rpc, int status)
00375 {
00376         __u64             magic = BRW_MAGIC;
00377         srpc_brw_reply_t *reply = &rpc->srpc_replymsg.msg_body.brw_reply;
00378         srpc_brw_reqst_t *reqst;
00379         srpc_msg_t       *reqstmsg;
00380 
00381         LASSERT (rpc->srpc_bulk != NULL);
00382         LASSERT (rpc->srpc_reqstbuf != NULL);
00383 
00384         reqstmsg = &rpc->srpc_reqstbuf->buf_msg;
00385         reqst = &reqstmsg->msg_body.brw_reqst;
00386 
00387         if (status != 0) {
00388                 CERROR ("BRW bulk %s failed for RPC from %s: %d\n",
00389                         reqst->brw_rw == LST_BRW_READ ? "READ" : "WRITE",
00390                         libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer), status);
00391                 return -EIO;
00392         }
00393 
00394         if (reqst->brw_rw == LST_BRW_READ)
00395                 return 0;
00396 
00397         if (reqstmsg->msg_magic != SRPC_MSG_MAGIC)
00398                 __swab64s(&magic);
00399 
00400         if (brw_check_bulk(rpc->srpc_bulk, reqst->brw_flags, magic) != 0) {
00401                 CERROR ("Bulk data from %s is corrupted!\n",
00402                         libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer));
00403                 reply->brw_status = EBADMSG;
00404         }
00405 
00406         return 0;
00407 }
00408 
00409 static int
00410 brw_server_handle(struct srpc_server_rpc *rpc)
00411 {
00412         struct srpc_service     *sv = rpc->srpc_scd->scd_svc;
00413         srpc_msg_t       *replymsg = &rpc->srpc_replymsg;
00414         srpc_msg_t       *reqstmsg = &rpc->srpc_reqstbuf->buf_msg;
00415         srpc_brw_reply_t *reply = &replymsg->msg_body.brw_reply;
00416         srpc_brw_reqst_t *reqst = &reqstmsg->msg_body.brw_reqst;
00417         int               npg;
00418         int               rc;
00419 
00420         LASSERT (sv->sv_id == SRPC_SERVICE_BRW);
00421 
00422         if (reqstmsg->msg_magic != SRPC_MSG_MAGIC) {
00423                 LASSERT (reqstmsg->msg_magic == __swab32(SRPC_MSG_MAGIC));
00424 
00425                 __swab32s(&reqst->brw_rw);
00426                 __swab32s(&reqst->brw_len);
00427                 __swab32s(&reqst->brw_flags);
00428                 __swab64s(&reqst->brw_rpyid);
00429                 __swab64s(&reqst->brw_bulkid);
00430         }
00431         LASSERT (reqstmsg->msg_type == (__u32)srpc_service2request(sv->sv_id));
00432 
00433         reply->brw_status = 0;
00434         rpc->srpc_done = brw_server_rpc_done;
00435 
00436         if ((reqst->brw_rw != LST_BRW_READ && reqst->brw_rw != LST_BRW_WRITE) ||
00437             (reqst->brw_flags != LST_BRW_CHECK_NONE &&
00438              reqst->brw_flags != LST_BRW_CHECK_FULL &&
00439              reqst->brw_flags != LST_BRW_CHECK_SIMPLE)) {
00440                 reply->brw_status = EINVAL;
00441                 return 0;
00442         }
00443 
00444         if ((reqstmsg->msg_ses_feats & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) != 0) {
00445                 replymsg->msg_ses_feats = LST_FEATS_MASK;
00446                 reply->brw_status = EPROTO;
00447                 return 0;
00448         }
00449 
00450         if ((reqstmsg->msg_ses_feats & LST_FEAT_BULK_LEN) == 0) {
00451                 /* compat with old version */
00452                 if ((reqst->brw_len & ~PAGE_MASK) != 0) {
00453                         reply->brw_status = EINVAL;
00454                         return 0;
00455                 }
00456                 npg = reqst->brw_len >> PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00457 
00458         } else {
00459                 npg = (reqst->brw_len + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) >> PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00460         }
00461 
00462         replymsg->msg_ses_feats = reqstmsg->msg_ses_feats;
00463 
00464         if (reqst->brw_len == 0 || npg > LNET_MAX_IOV) {
00465                 reply->brw_status = EINVAL;
00466                 return 0;
00467         }
00468 
00469         rc = sfw_alloc_pages(rpc, rpc->srpc_scd->scd_cpt, npg,
00470                              reqst->brw_len,
00471                              reqst->brw_rw == LST_BRW_WRITE);
00472         if (rc != 0)
00473                 return rc;
00474 
00475         if (reqst->brw_rw == LST_BRW_READ)
00476                 brw_fill_bulk(rpc->srpc_bulk, reqst->brw_flags, BRW_MAGIC);
00477         else
00478                 brw_fill_bulk(rpc->srpc_bulk, reqst->brw_flags, BRW_POISON);
00479 
00480         return 0;
00481 }

00483 sfw_test_client_ops_t brw_test_client;
00484 void brw_init_test_client(void)
00485 {
00486         brw_test_client.tso_init       = brw_client_init;
00487         brw_test_client.tso_fini       = brw_client_fini;
00488         brw_test_client.tso_prep_rpc   = brw_client_prep_rpc;
00489         brw_test_client.tso_done_rpc   = brw_client_done_rpc;
00490 };
00491 
00492 srpc_service_t brw_test_service;
00493 void brw_init_test_service(void)
00494 {
00495 
00496         brw_test_service.sv_id         = SRPC_SERVICE_BRW;
00497         brw_test_service.sv_name       = "brw_test";
00498         brw_test_service.sv_handler    = brw_server_handle;
00499         brw_test_service.sv_bulk_ready = brw_bulk_ready;
00500         brw_test_service.sv_wi_total   = brw_srv_workitems;
00501 }
